articles.title: Relax with the calming sound of NASA’s Perseverance firing lasers on Mars - The Verge
articles.description: NASA has released an audio recording of its Perseverance rover firing lasers on Mars. It’s designed to help scientists analyse the rocks around the rover. The audio sounds like a series of small clicks when recorded by the microphone.
